title: Build an Artificial Hand | Scientific American
body: Extra: Plastic straws can be somewhat slippery, so try to improve the "grip" of your mechanical hand. For example, wrap small rubber bands around the straws. For example, wrap small rubber bands ...
readable_content: - ScientificAmericanFan (2023-12-08): This article provides a comprehensive overview of building a simple artificial hand for educational purposes, outlining the materials needed and a step-by-step procedure for creating the hand. It also discusses the challenges in building versatile robotic hands and encourages experimentation with different designs and materials.
